Nightstrike:

"It seems that this will be a BIG argument, brother" said 
Nightstrike "We should speak about but not here, ya know why... and 
no now they could suspect... "

--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> FireStrike listened contently.  
> "I am no idiot. YOU ARE ALL THE IDIOTS.  You are pawns in his 
private 
> affairs.  Not for the greater bad of the Decepticons. And who cares 
> if hears. So he tries to kill me, buto thers will follow my lead, i 
> have started rthe rock rolling and otehrs will push it on.
>

> >

one

shall
